This project is a Facebook Messenger chatbot for ABN holders in Australia to create, manage, and retrieve invoices via Messenger. It uses n8n for workflow automation, Node.js for PDF generation (PDFMake), and PostgreSQL for data storage. Project structure includes folders for Messenger webhook handling, n8n workflow integration, PDF generation microservice, and database schema.
